summary: The Women in Agriculture Act (H.R. 2638) amends the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 to establish a Women Farmers and Ranchers Liaison within the Department. This liaison will provide information, assistance, and advocacy for women in agriculture. The bill also mandates reports on funding for woman-owned agricultural operations and prioritizes research on ergonomically designed agricultural equipment. Finally, it gives priority to childcare initiatives in rural communities when awarding loans and grants.
